title: AI Code That Fixes Itself (An MCP You Can Try Now)
description:
AI coding assistants (even the best ones like Claude Code) constantly make frustrating mistakes - wrong function names, incorrect syntax, endless debugging loops. 

Here I introduce a breakthrough solution that is still very experimental: indexing open source projects into knowledge graphs that enable AI to self-correct in real-time. Instead of guessing at APIs/SDK syntax and getting stuck in infinite debugging loops, AI coding assistants can now query exact syntax, validate its code against actual codebases, and heal itself automatically.

I even give a live demonstration showing how this knowledge graph approach eliminates hallucinations and creates truly reliable AI coding. This isn't just incremental improvement - it's the foundation for taking AI coding assistants to the next level of reliability and usefulness.
